title: The Blobs
description: The Bloomington family, Bill, Betty and Bobo are forced to leave their homeland and their fellow Blue Blobs as their land no longer grows the blueberries they survive on. After a long and arduous journey they find an island that is perfect for growing blueberries. Soon after they realize that the island has inhabitants who do not make them welcome. Will they find a way to get along? Two little characters will show them the way.
author: Christian der Kinderen
